title: Professor’s awesome note to class
text:
Share on Twitter 
THEY say the only certainties in life are death and taxes. But if you’re someone who doesn’t identify as totally straight, it’s more like death, taxes, and inappropriate, unsolicited questions about your “lifestyle”. 
People make a lot of assumptions about those who identify as members of the LGBTIQ community. Some think being gay is a choice, that it’s somehow weird, and that the whole world will burst into flames if same-sex marriage is made legal. 
Moving through the world is a gay person can be tiresome. Answering all those dumb questions is annoying. 
So to help prove this point, a college professor put up this slide in his class, titled “Questions for Heterosexuals in the Class”. Twitter user Elise posted this with the caption, “my professor isn’t taking anyone’s shit”. my professor isn't taking anyone's shit pic.twitter.com/SQrFbjUiz1
